Class Tile

  • java.lang.Object
    • Tile
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    Goal, Hazard, Robot, Wall

    public abstract class Tile
extends java.lang.Object
    An abstract class for a tile that can go on a grid

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static int HEIGHT
      The height in pixels of a tile
      static int WIDTH
      The width in pixels of a tile

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Tile()
      Constucts a default tile, used by the Robot class
      Tile(java.lang.String imgPath)
      Constructs a tile to use the image at the given path as a sprite

    • Method Summary

      boolean isHazard()

      void render(int x, int y, java.awt.Graphics g)
      Draw this tile, with the top left corner at x and y, on the given graphics object
      protected void setImage(java.awt.image.BufferedImage image)
      Set the sprite for this tile

        public Tile(java.lang.String imgPath)
        Constructs a tile to use the image at the given path as a sprite

    • Method Detail

      • render

        public void render(int x,
                   int y,
                   java.awt.Graphics g)
        Draw this tile, with the top left corner at x and y, on the given graphics object
        Parameters:
        x - the x coordinate of the top left corner
        y - the y coordinate of the top left corner
        g - the graphics object on which to draw the sprite

      • setImage

        protected void setImage(java.awt.image.BufferedImage image)
        Set the sprite for this tile
        Parameters:
        image - the image to set as the new sprite
